text: When I notice complex situations, I recognize them and choose to see connections and patterns instead of focusing only on immediate details.
During moments when I need to think ahead, I notice it and choose to consider long-term consequences and multiple outcomes instead.
When I feel the pull to focus only on immediate tasks, I notice it and choose to consider broader context and strategy instead.
I let not being able to see connections prevent me from thinking strategically and anticipating obstacles.
When I notice patterns in complex situations, I recognize them and choose to use them for strategic planning instead.
I see when situations need strategic thinking, and I choose to consider multiple paths and outcomes instead.
When I feel the urge to react without thinking ahead, I notice it and choose to pause and plan strategically instead.
I let not identifying strategic patterns prevent me from thinking ahead and anticipating obstacles effectively.
When I notice myself thinking strategically, I recognize it and choose to maintain those pattern-recognition habits.
I recognize when situations need long-term thinking, and I choose to consider consequences and connections instead.
When I feel the pull to ignore broader context, I notice it and choose to see connections and patterns instead.
I let problems from not seeing connections prevent me from thinking strategically and anticipating obstacles.
When I notice strategic thinking working, I recognize it and choose to strengthen those pattern-recognition habits.
I see when I need to think ahead, and I choose to consider multiple outcomes and long-term consequences instead.
When I feel the urge to focus only on immediate details, I notice it and choose to see broader context instead.
I let not being able to think strategically prevent me from seeing connections and anticipating obstacles.
When I notice myself maintaining strategic awareness, I recognize it and choose to strengthen those thinking patterns.
I recognize when situations need pattern recognition, and I choose to see connections and think ahead instead.
When I feel the pull to ignore long-term consequences, I notice it and choose to think strategically and plan ahead instead.
I let not identifying strategic thinking abilities prevent me from seeing connections and anticipating obstacles effectively.
